REPORT.name: Прибыль по дням
REPORT.description: Суммарная прибыль за каждый день --- Author: GameClass Software support@gameclass.ru
REPORT.code: select CONVERT(varchar(10),[moment],111) as [Дата], SUM([summa]) as [Сумма] from [repDetails] where ([moment] >= %TIME-START%) and ([moment]<=%TIME-STOP%) GROUP BY CONVERT(varchar(10),[moment],111) order by [Дата] desc
REPORT.author: NodaSoft
